ComicInfo.Title: Part 3: The $1,475,964 Man
ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE $1,475,964 MAN”
In this issue: KRAKKA-CHAKKA-BRAKA-PACHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Steve Austin gets hit by lightning. That’d kill anybody else. But for a broken-down-and-battery-depleted-former-astronaut-turned-cyborg-secret-agent-in-Japan-desperate-to-save-the-world kinda guy like Steve? Just what the doctor ordered.
By CHRISTOPHER HASTINGS (The Unbelievable Gwenpool! Secret Agent Deadpool! Adventure Time! I Am Groot!) and DAVID HAHN (Batman ’66! Bombshells: United!)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Michael Walsh | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric Gapstur & Chris O'Halloran | 2 | C | Cover C | Felipe Magana | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Eric Gapstur & Chris O'Halloran | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Michael Walsh | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Felipe Magana | 6 |
